thread.section_title: Houzz Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Houzz | www.houzz.com | 2 of 299
thread.title: GW

author: GW
title: GW
text: I purchased a double vanity with marble top with white glove delivery. Great product, excellent quality and as described. Delivery was on the second floor and they brought it upstairs, unpacked it and took away the packaging material. After I purchased, but before the delivery, the price went down. They honored the reduction without a blink. Very nice to deal with and they do what they say. I've made a few more purchases at prices that beat my Direct Buy prices. Now I have some wool stair runners coming at a cost below polypropylene carpets. I'm a fan.
